description: React component for managing user playlists, including listing, creating, editing, and deleting playlists, with API interactions and UI controls.

methods.name: loadPlaylists
methods.description: Fetches the playlists from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Navigates to the selected playlist's detail page.

methods.name: dispatchSidebarRefresh
methods.description: Dispatches a custom event to refresh sidebar data.

methods.name: onCreatedOrUpdated
methods.description: Handles the creation or update of a playlist, updating state and UI.

methods.name: onDeleted
methods.description: Handles deletion of a playlist, refreshing list and UI.
